mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loan_contracts (contract_no, application_id, customer_id, principal_amount, interest_rate, term_months, repayment_method, monthly_payment, outstanding_balance, total_interest_paid, status, start_date, end_date, executed_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{contractNo}, #{applicationId}, #{customerId}, #{principalAmount}, #{interestRate}, #{termMonths}, #{repaymentMethod}, #{monthlyPayment}, #{outstandingBalance}, #{totalInterestPaid}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{executedAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT lc.*, c.name AS customer_name, la.application_no FROM loan_contracts lc LEFT JOIN customers c ON lc.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN loan_applications la ON lc.application_id = la.id WHERE lc.id = #{id}

SELECT lc.*, c.name AS customer_name, la.application_no FROM loan_contracts lc LEFT JOIN customers c ON lc.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN loan_applications la ON lc.application_id = la.id WHERE lc.contract_no = #{contractNo}

SELECT lc.*, c.name AS customer_name, la.application_no FROM loan_contracts lc LEFT JOIN customers c ON lc.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN loan_applications la ON lc.application_id = la.id WHERE lc.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY lc.created_at DESC

SELECT lc.*, c.name AS customer_name, la.application_no FROM loan_contracts lc LEFT JOIN customers c ON lc.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN loan_applications la ON lc.application_id = la.id ORDER BY lc.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE loan_contracts SET outstanding_balance = #{outstandingBalance}, total_interest_paid = #{totalInterestPaid}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loan_contracts WHERE status = #{status}
